title: axum::Server to axum_server

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I started with axum example rest_grpc_multiplex and added cors and rustls axum::Server:: does not support rustls so I changed it to axum_server:: ### Code ```Rust let config = RustlsConfig::from_pem_file( PathBuf::from(env!("CARGO_MANIFEST_DIR")) .join("self_signed_certs") .join("cert.pem"), PathBuf::from(env!("CARGO_MANIFEST_DIR")) .join("self_signed_certs") .join("key.pem"), ) .await .unwrap(); let cors = CorsLayer::permissive(); //.permissive(); // allow any headers //.allow_headers(Any) // allow `POST` when accessing the resource //.allow_methods(Any) // allow requests from below origins //.allow_origin(AllowOrigin::any()); // (["http://localhost:5000".parse()?, "https://localhost:5001".parse()?]); // build the rest service let rest = Router::new() .route("/", get(web_root)) .layer(cors); // build the grpc service let grpc = EchoServer::new(GrpcServiceImpl::default()); // combine them into one service let service = MultiplexService::new(rest, grpc); let addr = SocketAddr::from(([0, 0, 0, 0], 3000)); tracing::debug!("listening on {}", addr); axum_server::bind_rustls(addr, config) .serve(tower::make::Shared::new(service)) .await .unwrap(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` ``` ### Error output ``` rror: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/context.rs:971:13: failed to get layout for `[async block@axum_server::Server::serve::{closure#0}::{closure#0}]`: unable to determine layout for `[async block@axum_server::Server::serve::{closure#0}::{closure#0}]` because `[async block@axum_server::Server::serve::{closure#0}::{closure#0}]` cannot be normalized thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/d0dc9efff14ac0a1eeceffd1e605e37eeb8362a0/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:973:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ff21f365a7a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h196c489280b5a090 at /rustc/d0dc9efff14ac0a1eeceffd1e605e37eeb8362a0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7ff21f365a7a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h13bf778637c29636 at /rustc/d0dc9efff14ac0a1eeceffd1e605e37eeb8362a0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7ff21f365a7a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h0f4861fc71bccacd at /rustc/d0dc9efff14ac0a1eeceffd1e605e37eeb8362a0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7ff21f365a7a -
